string: These pages have been torn from a book. Twisted ramblings of twisted men.

The Covenant would have you believe great strength comes from collective effort. They taught us that Aeternum is to be feared, that only by working together can we survive. 

This is not true. 

There is power all around us. The individual can not only survive but thrive in this land should they choose to embrace the call.

Much will be asked of you. 

Things impossible to take will be taken from you, but great sacrifices reward great power. 
First, let the whispers into your mind for knowledge unknowable. Soon after, you will be taught what strength is hiding inside your body. Finally, embrace the change. The weak fear transformation. The strong revel in it.

Embrace strength. Strength strength STRENGTH strength (The writing becomes increasingly erratic and illegible, smeared with what appears to be blood. This page was rather violently torn from its book.)
